content.raw:
Performance is definitely good with this change! It seems the dimensions of the docks have changed, but as we don’t know the true dimensions this is okay for now. 

‌

If another mesh is being created anyways, perhaps we should consider getting the true dimensions of the docks and getting a single mesh for each of them as they only change potentially every 2 years
